title: What are the questions that life can never answer you? - Quora

response.answer_text: "Does this dress make me look fat?" We can't be sure if this question has ever been answered honestly, because dead men don't talk. ::

Glad you asked, it got me fine tuning an answer that can get in a small place. What if we start with 2 basic categories? Self-deceit or deceiving others in the order of frequency. I doubt that very many questions at all can be answered honestly if they are personal. which you imply. Motive 1: Emotional, financial, or social gain. “If I admitted to myself why I’m doing, acting, ect. this I”d never let myself do it, so I won’t answer myself truthfully. Thousands of things can fall into this intra-psychic category. It’s called “Rationalization”. Facework: It is usually the case that you can’t answer honestly, or you’d be lonely pretty quick. We could go on at some length, but I thought you might like a different kind of answer that’s “Food for thought”.
